name: Rocket Jump Box
description:
It's a platformer where you shoot rockets instead of running around.

The game was made for GMTK GameJam 2018 (48 hours).

It will be my lesson how not to waste your time not working on your project.
The game has only one short level and thats it.

No additional mechanics are implemented yet (and they will never be). Have little fun with my little idea.
